#### Load Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse) 
library(dplyr)
```

#### Read in Data and Convert Stat Files to Data Frames
```{r}
### Memorial
# read in Memorial Fantasy data
Memorial_Fantasy <- read.csv("Memorial_Fantasy.csv", sep=',', header = F)

Memorial_Fantasy <- Memorial_Fantasy %>%
  slice(-c(1)) # remove first row of Memorial Fantasy

names(Memorial_Fantasy) <- c("Player", "Salary", "FPTS", "Tournament", "Par")
# assign variable names to the 5 columns

# read in Memorial Stats data
Memorial_Stats <- read.csv("Memorial_Stats.txt", sep=',', header = F)

Memorial_Stats <- Memorial_Stats %>%
  slice(-c(1)) # remove first row of Memorial Stats
  
Memorial_Stats <- as.data.frame(matrix(Memorial_Stats$V1, ncol=9, byrow=T)) # wrangle data into data table

names(Memorial_Stats) <- c("Position", "Player", "Score", "Putt", "ARG", "App", "OTT", "T2G", "Total")
# assign variable names to the 9 columns
```

```{r}
### PGA INFORMATION

names(PGA_Stats) <- c('Position', 'Player', 'Score', 'Putt', 'ARG', 'APP', 'OTT', 'T2G', 'Total') #assign variable names to 9 columns in PGA Stats
```
